TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IServiceContractGenerationExtension

Docs.summary: Defines the methods called during contract generation that can be used to modify the generated code for a service contract.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension> interface on a contract behavior (a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior?displayProperty=fullName> type) to enable you to modify the code generated when a contract or endpoint is compiled into code.
Typically, a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName> inserts a custom contract behavior into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection during the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A>.
## Examples The following code example shows how to add an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property during the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A>.
[!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/wsdldocumentationimporter.cs#4)]
The following code examples show the implementation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A> that adds comments to the code generated for a service contract.
[!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/wsdldocumentationimporter.cs#12)]
The following code example shows the generated comments on the service contract.
[!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/newgeneratedcontract.cs#3)] [!code-vb[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/newgeneratedcontract.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GenerateContract(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: The code generated context to use to modify the code document prior to generation.
Docs.summary: Implement to modify the code document object model prior to the contract generation process.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=fullName> to modify the contract, operations, or the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator?displayProperty=fullName> prior to code generation.
## Examples The following code example shows how to add an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property during the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A>.
[!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/wsdldocumentationimporter.cs#4)]
The following code examples show the implementation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A> that adds comments to the code generated for a service contract.
[!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/wsdldocumentationimporter.cs#12)]
The following code example shows the generated comments on the service contract.
[!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/newgeneratedcontract.cs#3)] [!code-vb[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/newgeneratedcontract.vb#3)]
